Notwithstanding the foregoing, we may retain information to provide services you have ordered, complete transactions, honor opt-outs, prevent fraud, spam, and other abuse, comply with our legal obligations, cooperate with law enforcement, and to exercise and defend our rights.
We may share your data as explained in this Privacy Policy, such as to enhance your experiences and our services, and those activities will be unaffected by a Nevada do not sell request.
For certain social network websites, Whova will only get and show information if users provided corresponding login credentials.
Whova may also use personal data with 3rd parties services and technologies as described below: Cookies, Pixel Tags, Local Shared Objects, Web Storage and other similar technologies.

You are responsible for updating any change in your email address by the same method and we are not obligated to cross-reference other emails you may have otherwise provided us for other purposes.

This includes circumstances where Whova obtains Personal Data as a result of the provision of its core event management services (for example, where Whova authenticates attendees' identity based on the attendee list that organizers uploaded to Whova, facilitates the transmission of emails to attendees at the request of Organizers, or provides event reports and tools to enable Organizers to gain insights into their attendees and the effectiveness of using the Whova products).

data_type: personal datum about use of whova services
text: b) Whova may use Personal Data about your use of Whova Services to improve our services.
When you use our services, we may share your personal information with advertising partners in a way that may constitute a sale under the CCPA.

For example, Attendees may share personal data when interacting with the platform, while Exhibitors and Sponsors may provide personal data to create and manage their accounts, communicate with other participants via private messages, and collect leads or contacts for follow-ups.

We may need to transfer your Personal Data outside of the country from which it was originally provided.
We retain your Personal Data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and processed.
We will also retain and use Personal Data for a period of time required to comply with our legal, tax, audit or regulatory obligations, to manage potential liability, to resolve disputes, and to enforce our agreements.
When you use our services, we may share your personal information with advertising partners in a way that may constitute a sale under the CCPA.

Event Participants may provide personal data directly to Whova to access and use its services, such as during account creation, profile setup, personal note-taking, private messaging, and engagement with platform features.
Whova may also use personal data with 3rd parties services and technologies as described below:
Whova will retain personal data for as long as necessary to provide its services to Event Participants or until a valid deletion request is submitted, in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
a) Whova may use Personal Data you provide to Whova Services to create and maintain your account, to personalize your experience, and to send email communications relating to Whova Services.
Whova may also use personal data with 3rd parties services and technologies as described below: Cookies, Pixel Tags, Local Shared Objects, Web Storage and other similar technologies.
